channel.title: Noclip problem
channel.description: In my rsps for some reason npcs and people they don't clip if you follow someone you go through everything how would I fix this?

item.title: Noclip problem
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

[quote=“PsychoScapeRSPS, post:5, topic:446359”][quote author=sssylasss link=topic=549222.msg4026393#msg4026393 date=1340370418]

Acrually, noclipped following is normal for most RSPS’s, and is in some cases more helpful that clipped following, but to clip your npcs you would have to declare each individual tile you want to clip, as clipping the world map causes lag.

no… just no…
[/quote]Am I mistaken? Because that’s what I did–and it worked just fine rofl.[/quote]
Wait, did you clip by writing the coords of every individual tile?
Just add serversided pathfinding.
It doesn’t lag. well at least I don’t think it does…

Read full topic

item.title: Noclip problem
item.dc:creator: @PsychoScapeRSPS PsychoScapeRSPS
item.description:
@PsychoScapeRSPS wrote:

[quote=“sssylasss, post:4, topic:446359”][quote author=PsychoScapeRSPS link=topic=549222.msg4026389#msg4026389 date=1340370283]
Acrually, noclipped following is normal for most RSPS’s, and is in some cases more helpful that clipped following, but to clip your npcs you would have to declare each individual tile you want to clip, as clipping the world map causes lag.
[/quote]

no… just no…[/quote]Am I mistaken? Because that’s what I did–and it worked just fine rofl.

Read full topic
